org.robobrain.sdk.graphics
Class TextureManager

java.lang.Object
  org.robobrain.sdk.graphics.TextureManager

public class TextureManager
extends java.lang.Object

Manages the creation and destruction of OpenGL textures throughout their life-cycle.

Author:
James Johnson

Field Summary
static int INVALID_ID
          Returned by Texture functions to signify an invalid texture.
 
Constructor Summary
TextureManager()
           
 
Method Summary
static Texture getTexture(int id)
          Finds the requested texture and loads it into OpenGL if necessary.
static void loadAll()
          loads all textures into video memory.
static void registerTexture(java.lang.String filename, int id)
          Registers a numeric constant with a particular texture.
static void release()
          Releases any memory associated with the TextureManager.
static void unloadAll()
          Unloads all textures from video memory.

INVALID_ID

public static final int INVALID_ID
Returned by Texture functions to signify an invalid texture.

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

TextureManager

public TextureManager()
Method Detail

registerTexture

public static void registerTexture(java.lang.String filename,
                                   int id)
Registers a numeric constant with a particular texture. After calling this function, use the ID to request the texture from the TextureManager.

Parameters:
filename - The image file to associate with the ID.
id - The ID used as a handle for the texture.

getTexture

public static Texture getTexture(int id)
Finds the requested texture and loads it into OpenGL if necessary.

Parameters:
id - The handle for the texture
Returns:
The valid Texture object or null if it is not available.

unloadAll

public static void unloadAll()
Unloads all textures from video memory.

release

public static void release()
Releases any memory associated with the TextureManager.

loadAll

public static void loadAll()
loads all textures into video memory.
